TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: return TriggerObject():GetSubType():Test( CREATURE_TYPE_MERFOLK ) ~= 0 and TriggerObject():GetPlayer() == Object():GetPlayer()
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_PLANESWALKER ) filter:SetHint( HINT_NEUTRAL, EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil then player:BeginNewMultipleChoice() player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_OPTION_TAP_TARGET_PERMANENT" ) player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_OPTION_UNTAP_TARGET_PERMANENT" ) player:AskMultipleChoiceQuestion( "CARD_QUERY_MC_TAP_OR_UNTAP" ) end

local player = EffectController() local decision = Object():GetMultipleChoiceResult() if decision == 0 then player:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_TO_TAP" ) elseif decision == 1 then player:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_TO_UNTAP" ) end EffectController():ChooseTargets( 0, EffectDC():Make_Targets(0))

local decision = Object():GetMultipleChoiceResult() local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if (target ~= nil and decision == 0) then target:Tap() elseif (target ~= nil and decision == 1) then target:Untap() end
